segments.text: Your resume says you have had one years experience working in a foreign representative office in Shanghai , may I ask why you quit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I worked in a foreign representative office for one year . However , I leave there two years ago because the work they gave me was rather dull . I found another job that was more interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you done any work in this field ? What have you learned from the jobs you have had ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have learned a lot about business know-how and basic office skills . In addition , I learned at my previous jobs how to cooperate with my colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2
